text: Şanlıurfa, Southeastern Anatolia Region Külaflı is a suburb of Karaköprü district that located in Şanlıurfa Province of Turkey. == Geography == The distance to the city center of Sanliurfa is 33 km from the suburb. == Climate == The climate in the suburb is mainly Continental climate, because there are significant annual temperature variations. It has hot summers and cold winters. == Demography == The number of people by year. {| class="wikitable" |2013 |161 |- |2014 |141 |- |2015 |150 |- |2016 |161 |- |2017 |179 |- |2018 |161 |} == Infrastructure == There are a primary school, healthcare center and a water network system in the suburb. == References == Category:Şanlıurfa Category:Populated places in Şanlıurfa Province Category:Southeastern Anatolia Region geography stubs
title: Külaflı, Karaköprü
